## Project-Specific Rules
- Refactor PokerRoom so that game logic resides in a reusable class (e.g., HoldemPokerGame) with serialization helpers for client reuse.
- Implement abstractions for items like cards and decks, ensuring clearer interfaces and responsibilities.
